content:
§oThis hammer is very different. It's a pickaxe, but also not. It's a §d§o3x3 pickaxe§r§o!§r

Make good use of this! You want it, I know it! This bad boy will give you so many ores in no time, given you are in a vein.

§3Drawers§r are configured to §6keep their Inventory§r when broken, so you can use them for your mining expeditions.


§eNote:§r Any Quest with GregTech tools can be completed with the tool crafted from any material, not just the one displayed.
